channel.title: Quest tab help!
channel.description: i got this PI server and when i click on the quest tab there would be like Owner: Website: i want to change it to my name can someone teach me?

item.title: Quest tab help!
item.dc:creator: @Owner_satan Owner satan
item.description:
@Owner_satan wrote:

Its in playerassistant.java… here search this…

Then you should see like c.getPA().sendFrame126 "owner", 7383);
it wont be exactly like that, but it will be somewhat similar…

Read full topic

item.title: Quest tab help!
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Things like this should not be set client-side. The default text should be set client-side, and altered server-side (I believe it’s packet 126).

Read full topic

item.title: Quest tab help!
item.dc:creator: @Adobe Adobe
item.description:
@Adobe wrote:

Do what fridder said… he made is perfectly clear… go to RSInterface.java in client files. search for something like this: addText(29163, "Register on :", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2); addHoverText(29164, "http://www.example.com", "Register", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
There should be the owners right above it, but thats where the website url would be in the quest tab.

Read full topic

item.title: Quest tab help!
item.dc:creator: @Owner_satan Owner satan
item.description:
@Owner_satan wrote:

It’s in playerassistant.java, I don’t understand this but if it’s already there, just search owner: then put after the : the owners or owner, if u wantit to say that I will post u a snippet. Hope this helped.
